Class ReadLevelInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • ReadLevelInfo

  • public class ReadLevelInfo
extends java.lang.Object
    Processes the information about a level and constructs a Level object.
    Creation Date: 20/11/19.
    Last Modification Date: 4/12/19.
    Version:
    1.4
    Author:
    Timothy Roger (977422)

    • Constructor Detail

      • ReadLevelInfo

        public ReadLevelInfo()

    • Method Detail

      • readConstructInfo

        public static Level readConstructInfo(java.lang.String[] info)
        Creates a level object, ready to be played, using the information in the passed list of strings.
        Parameters:
        info - String[] - The list of strings containing all the data from a level file. Each element is a line of the file.
        Returns:
        the initialised and completed Level object, ready to be played.

      • makeConstructInfo

        public static java.lang.String[] makeConstructInfo(Level lvl)
        Creates an array of strings based on the passed level. This is used when saving a state of a level.
        Parameters:
        lvl - Level - the Level instance to be saved.
        Returns:
        the finished array of Strings to be written into a file presumably.

      • readDim

        private static int[] readDim(java.lang.String dimInfo)
        Takes a String containing the dimensions of the map (in number of cells) and convert it into a pair of integer values.
        Parameters:
        dimInfo - String - contains the dimensions of the map as "H,W", where H is the height integer and W the width.
        Returns:
        the array containing the integers of the height and width of the map.

      • readMapLine

        private static Cell[] readMapLine(java.lang.String lineInfo)
        Creates a list of Cell objects based on a string of characters.
        Parameters:
        lineInfo - String - has characters corresponding to a certain type of cell, making up one row of cells in the map.
        Returns:
        the created list of Cell objects.

      • createCell

        private static Cell createCell(char cellSymb)
        Creates a Cell object based on the character passed to it.
        Parameters:
        cellSymb - char - determines the subclass of Cell to be created.
        Returns:
        the created object masked as a Cell object.

      • readCharInfo

        private static Character readCharInfo(java.lang.String[] charInfo)
        Creates a Character instance based on an array of strings. This includes saved inventory.
        Parameters:
        charInfo - String[] - Contains the information needed to create the Character instance.
        Returns:
        the constructed Character instance to be used.

      • createColl

        private static Collectable createColl(java.lang.String collInfo)
        Creates a Collectable instance based of a small String passed to the method.
        Parameters:
        collInfo - String - Contains all information for the Collectable instance.
        Returns:
        The constructed Collectable.

      • addInfo

        private static Cell[][] addInfo(Cell[][] tempMap,
                                java.lang.String[] info)
        Based on information in an array of strings, values are added to certain Cell instances in the map.
        Parameters:
        tempMap - Cell[][] - The temporary map to be changed.
        info - String[] - Holds information about the change that needs to be made.
        Returns:
        the temporary map that has been changed.

      • addTeleInfo

        private static Cell[][] addTeleInfo(Cell[][] tempMap,
                                    java.lang.String[] tele1Info,
                                    java.lang.String[] tele2Info)
        Adds information to a Teleporter pair using two lines of the level file as String arrays.
        Parameters:
        tempMap - Cell[][] - the temporary map in which the Teleporter instances reside.
        tele1Info - String[] - Holds all needed information for the first of the pair.
        tele2Info - String[] - Holds all needed information for the second of the pair.
        Returns:
        the temporary map with the new information added.

      • addEnemy

        private static Enemy[] addEnemy(Enemy[] tempEnemies,
                                java.lang.String[] info)
        Adds an Enemy to the passed array of Enemies.
        Parameters:
        tempEnemies - Enemy[] - the current array of Enemy instances.
        info - String[] - holds all information about the enemy to be added.
        Returns:
        the array of Enemy instances which should now include one more.

      • makeMapLine

        private static java.lang.String makeMapLine(Level lvl,
                                            int rowN,
                                            int rowLen)
        Makes a line of characters based on the cells in a row of the level's map.
        Parameters:
        lvl - Level - the instance of Level the row will be from.
        rowN - int - the index of the row to be converted.
        rowLen - int - the length of the row, which is the same value as the width of the map.
        Returns:
        The String containing the line of characters.

      • getCellChar

        private static char getCellChar(Cell c)
        Returns a character based on the Cell passed to the method.
        Parameters:
        c - Cell - the cell instance to be used.
        Returns:
        the char value signifying the Cell type.

      • makeCharLine

        private static java.lang.String makeCharLine(Character c,
                                             int time,
                                             int deathCount)
        Makes the line with all the character's information, which also includes the level's current cumulative time.
        Parameters:
        c - Character - the Character instance to be used.
        time - int - the current cumulative playtime of the level to be added.
        deathCount - int - the current cumulative deaths of the level to be added.
        Returns:
        the String with the finished line.

      • getCollectableString

        private static java.lang.String getCollectableString(Collectable c)

        Parameters:
        c - Collectable - the Collectable instance to be used.
        Returns:
        the finished String.

      • makeAddInfo

        private static java.lang.String makeAddInfo(Level lvl)
        Creates a String including all the lines of additional information needed to save the Level state.
        Parameters:
        lvl - Level - the level instance to be used.
        Returns:
        the finished String.

      • makeEnemyLine

        Returns:
